title: Guardsman Fabric & Carpet Stain Remover Spray - 500ml to Clean and Protect Fabric Furnitures- Restore Fabric Upholstery Cleaning Spray for Carpets, Sofas, Car interiors, Dining Chairs & Rugs
features: KEEP UPHOLSTERY CLEAN & STAIN FREE with Guardsman fabric upholstery cleaner spray. Made with powerful stain-lift technology, our fabric upholstery cleaner rejuvenates the fabric by deep-cleaning old stains, new spots, messy spills and more.

THE ONLY CLEANER YOU WILL EVER NEED: Our fabric cleaner spray can be used for most upholstered fabric furniture in your house. Simply spray when the stain happens. Suitable for use on - sofas, chairs, curtains, recliners, carpets, rugs, car interiors, caravans and more.

NO RUBBING, NO SCRUBBING, NO HASSLE: Did you know it’s actually bad if you scrub the stain, as you can cause irreparable damage to the fabric weave or the carpet pile. Our professional strength, fabric and carpet cleaner does all the hard work, so all you have to do is spray it onto the stain, leave it for a few minutes to work its magic and then blot gently with a dampened cloth.

HARSH ON STAINS NOT THE FABRIC: The water-based formula removes just the stains, not the beautiful colour of your sofa or carpet. Our effective yet gentle carpet and upholstery cleaner does not contain bleaching agents or leave dirt attracting residues, so it should not harm your fabric. You can use it worry-free on your expensive investment. We always recommend that you test the product in an inconspicuous area first to ensure you are happy with the results before using it.

PURCHASE WITH CONFIDENCE: Satisfaction of customers is our primary concern. In an unlikely event, if you are not happy with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days and we will refund your money. No questions asked. That’s our iron-clad guarantee.
description: Product Description Protecting & repairing furniture since 1915. Delivering quality products and care to maintain furniture. Professional, technologically advanced products which have been developed in conjunction with some of the leading furniture product manufacturers for the protection, care and repair of wooden, fabric and leather furnishings. Our company aim is to help everyone enjoy and be proud of their furniture. Guardsman offer furniture protection insurance as well as a furniture repair service for those damages that require a skilled, qualified repair technician; so our product ranges have been developed with a real understanding of furniture and we know how to keep it looking as good as the day it was delivered. We have been protecting and repairing furniture since 1915 and have been a long-time leader in the furnishing industry, we know furniture! Fabric Care Collection Guardsman Fabric Care Collection is a cleaning cupboard staple! With 3 specialist products to clean, stain remove and refresh fabric upholstery, it will help to keep it looking it’s best from the moment it’s delivered. Guardsman fabric care products won’t affect the original look or feel of the fabric and leave no soil-attracting residues; and it’s versatile as is also suitable for carpets and curtains. Fabric Protector Keep your fabric upholstery looking it’s finest with our Fabric Protector Spray. Our efficient and powerful upholstery protector forms a breathable barrier to improve stain resistance and cleanability. It will help repel most stains that could ruin the beautiful look of your furniture. It works on most types of fabrics used for sofas, chairs, car interiors and more; but we always recommend testing it first in an inconspicuous area to make sure you are happy with the results. Fabric Stain Remover Guardsman fabric upholstery stain remover spray is specially formulated with powerful stain-lift technology, which will rejuvenate the fabric by deep-cleaning old stains, new spots, messy spills and more. Our fabric stain remover spray can be used for most upholstered fabric furniture in your house. Simply spray when the stain happens. Suitable for use on sofas, chairs, curtains, recliners, carpets, rugs, car interiors, caravans and more. Fabric Odour Remover A water based deodoriser, it eliminates unwanted odours and refreshes fabric with a spring-time fragrance. Ideal to remove unpleasant smells from your fabric upholstered furniture, carpets, curtains, wardrobe, and clothes. This fabric deodoriser spray has a lasting effect, leaving your home smelling refreshed. Our unique odour eliminating spray neutralises any bad odour rather than masking it, thus eliminating the problem at the root, leaving the surface smelling fresh. Fabric Care Collection Fabric Protector Fabric Stain Remover Fabric Odour Remover Dining and Cabinet Collection Our Dining and Cabinet Care Collection has everything you need to keep your furniture looking beautiful. Containing wood, glass and marble cleaner to remove dirt, grime, food and drink stains as well as fingerprints and other grease marks; Fabric stain remover to clean your fabric without harming it; Leather 3-in-1 wipes to clean, condition and protect leather and a Wood polish to give wood a natural lustre, using UV absorbers to protect against fading and discolouration. Ring & Mark Remover - Available in 1 Pack & 2 Pack Coffee stains, water droplets, and hazy spots on your favourite table are a thing of the past. With the Water Ring and Mark Remover, you can easily restore the original finish of your wooden furniture without costly repairs. Simply wipe the affected area with your reusable treated cloth and watch stains disappear. You may have to persevere as it can be more difficult to remove more stubborn marks. This specially treated 4 x 5 inch cloth removes minor stains and is also reusable, allowing you to keep it handy for whenever you might need to use it. Made from 100% cotton, the cloth is effective on marks up to two years old. Can be used again and again if stored in its resealable pouch. Wood Deep Clean Wood Cleaner leaves wood furniture looking fresh and clean to the touch. Gentle for frequent wood cleaning yet tough enough to remove grime and residue left by food and grease. Quickly removes built-up residue such as dirt, oily films, and dried spills from wood furniture. Cleans free of streaks and dust-attracting residue. Not suitable for unfinished wooden furniture. Dusting Cloth - Available in 1 Pack & 2 Pack Guardsman Reusable Dusting Cloths are specially treated and lint-free to quickly grab and trap dust to remove allergens for healthier, cleaner air without the use of sprays. And unlike many sprays, our soft, cotton flannel cleaning cloths leave behind no dust-attracting residue. Specially treated, residue-free cloths trap and lock-in dust, unlike paper towels or other rags that just push around dust or even leave fibres behind. Ideal for all your dusting needs: use on furniture, blinds, appliances, auto interiors, cabinets and panelling, glass and mirrors, ceiling fans, walls and railings. Also fits most floor sweepers—just fold in half, wrap around the sweeper, and attach as appropriate. Rinse and reuse each cloth. Unlike disposable wipes and paper towels, our furniture dusting clothes are meant to be reused simply rinse and air dry. Dining and Cabinet Care Collection Wood Ring & Mark Remover Wood Deep Clean Wood Dusting Cloth (Pre-Treated) Mattress Protector - Luxury, Super King (Available in All Sizes) The Guardsman luxury mattress protector is reversible with a soft micro fibre fleece on one side and a cool smooth surface on the other, giving you the flexibility to choose. The luxury protector uses micro fibres to draw moisture away from the body keeping you comfortable throughout the night and has a waterproof membrane stopping any spills and stains from penetrating through to the mattress. The additional quilting and protective padding in the protector provide a soft luxurious sleep surface for ultimate comfort body keeping you comfortable throughout the night.. Available in Single, Double, King & Super King sizes. Mattress Protectors - Luxury, King (Available in All Sizes) The Guardsman luxury mattress protector is reversible with a soft micro fibre fleece on one side and a cool smooth surface on the other, giving you the flexibility to choose. The luxury protector uses micro fibres to draw moisture away from the body keeping you comfortable throughout the night and has a waterproof membrane stopping any spills and stains from penetrating through to the mattress. The additional quilting and protective padding in the protector provide a soft luxurious sleep surface for ultimate comfort body keeping you comfortable throughout the night.. Available in Single, Double, King & Super King sizes. Mattress Protectors - Natural, King (Available in All Sizes) Natural; the soft, smooth Lyocell fibre surface provides effortless comfort. The Natural fibre, Lyocell is so soft it can be used as a sheet. Perfect for those who want a protector that is as light as a feather and barely noticeable. Available in Single, Double, King & Super King sizes. Mattress Protector - Classic, Double (Available in All Sizes) The Classic Mattress Protector has a porous terry cotton surface which provides a soft highly absorbent surface; A breathable layer to wick away heat and moisture and a waterproof membrane meaning any spills and stains won’t penetrate through to the mattress. Protects your mattress from dust mites and their allergens, bacteria, mould and mildew. Available in Single, Double, King & Super King sizes. Luxury Mattress Protector Natural Mattress Protector Classic Mattress Protectors Classic Mattress Protector Leather Care Collection Guardsman's leather care collection has been specially-formulated with our partners in Italy, a world leader in the leather industry. It's designed to care for, clean and protect leather furniture and keep it looking fresh. Whether you're cleaning leather, protecting it against stains and water, or trying to remove marks from your leather such as ink and permanent marker, Guardsman’s leather protection products use oil-free formulas that won’t damage your leather finish. A collection of 3 specialist Leather cleaning products to prolong the life of your furniture and keep it looking its best. Leather Cleaner Guardsman leather cleaner removes dirt and grime gently and thoroughly while rejuvenating the appearance of the leather, helping to keep it looking like new. It has been developed with a gentle unique pH balanced and alkaline-free formula and contains no oils, dulling waxes, or additives allowing the natural soft and supple feel of the leather to be preserved and enhanced with every use. Leather Renew 3 in 1 Our leather 3-in-1 protectant spay will look after your precious leather items by keeping them hydrated and protected. Treated leather surfaces will resist wear and tear and stay in good condition for longer. Our 3-in-1 formula gently cleanses, nourishes and creates an invisible barrier that repels staining and makes cleaning it easy. This versatile leather cleaner, protector and conditioner spray is ideal for all types of leather except nubuck and suede. You can use Guardsman leather cleaner and protectant on anything from leather clothes and shoes to car interior and handbags. Leather Protector Guardsman leather protector will preserve and maintain the original colour and finish of your leather items. It creates a stain barrier that is invisible and breathable to safeguard leather against premature ageing and stop stains from penetrating and causing irreversible damage. Thanks to the unique water-based, pH balanced formula, the Guardsman leather protector ensures the leather items are left feeling soft and supple. Guardsman leather protector spray helps to guard against everyday household stains and helps leather repel dirt and grime. For best results, we always recommend cleaning the leather first with Guardsman Leather Clean & Renew. Guardsman leather protect and preserve is perfect to use on finished, semi aniline, aniline and bonded leather. And you can also use it on vinyl. However, it is not suitable for nubuck, suede, or buffed leathers. Leather Care Collection Leather Cleaner Leather Renew 3 in 1 Leather Protector
